info.title: PostgreSQLManagementClient
info.description: The Microsoft Azure management API provides create, read, update, and delete functionality for Azure PostgreSQL resources including servers, databases, firewall rules, log files and configurations.

properties.description: Enable input of NULL elements in arrays.
Sets whether "\'" is allowed in string literals.
Sets the output format for bytea.
Check function bodies during CREATE FUNCTION.
Sets the client's character set encoding.
Sets the message levels that are sent to the client.
Enables the planner to use constraints to optimize queries.
Sets the planner's estimate of the cost of processing each index entry during an index scan.
Sets the planner's estimate of the cost of processing each operator or function call.
Sets the planner's estimate of the cost of processing each tuple (row).
Sets the planner's estimate of the fraction of a cursor's rows that will be retrieved.
Sets the display format for date and time values.
Sets the amount of time, in milliseconds, to wait on a lock before checking for deadlock.
Logs each query's parse tree.
Logs each query's execution plan.
Logs each query's rewritten parse tree.
Sets the default statistics target.
Sets default text search configuration.
Sets the default deferrable status of new transactions.
Sets the transaction isolation level of each new transaction.
Sets the default read-only status of new transactions.
Create new tables with OIDs by default.
Enables the planner's use of bitmap-scan plans.
Enables the planner's use of hashed aggregation plans.
Enables the planner's use of hash join plans.
Enables the planner's use of index-only-scan plans.
Enables the planner's use of index-scan plans.
Enables the planner's use of materialization.
Enables the planner's use of merge join plans.
Enables the planner's use of nested-loop join plans.
Enables the planner's use of sequential-scan plans.
Enables the planner's use of explicit sort steps.
Enables the planner's use of TID scan plans.
Warn about backslash escapes in ordinary string literals.
Terminate session on any error.
Sets the number of digits displayed for floating-point values.
Sets the FROM-list size beyond which subqueries are not collapsed.
Enables genetic query optimization.
GEQO: effort is used to set the default for other GEQO parameters.
GEQO: number of iterations of the algorithm.
GEQO: number of individuals in the population.
GEQO: seed for random path selection.
GEQO: selective pressure within the population.
Sets the threshold of FROM items beyond which GEQO is used.
Sets the maximum allowed result for exact search by GIN.
Sets the display format for interval values.
Sets the FROM-list size beyond which JOIN constructs are not flattened.
Sets the maximum allowed duration (in milliseconds) of any wait for a lock. 0 turns this off.
Logs each checkpoint.
Logs each successful connection.
Logs end of a session, including duration.
Logs the duration of each completed SQL statement.
Sets the verbosity of logged messages.
Logs long lock waits.
Sets the minimum execution time (in milliseconds) above which statements will be logged. -1 disables logging statement durations.
Causes all statements generating error at or above this level to be logged.
Sets the message levels that are logged.
Sets the type of statements logged.
Sets the maximum number of locks per transaction.
Sets the maximum number of predicate locks per transaction.
Sets the maximum number of simultaneously prepared transactions.
When generating SQL fragments, quote all identifiers.
Sets the planner's estimate of the cost of a nonsequentially fetched disk page.
Sets the schema search order for names that are not schema-qualified.
Sets the planner's estimate of the cost of a sequentially fetched disk page.
Causes subtables to be included by default in various commands.
Causes '...' strings to treat backslashes literally.
Sets the maximum allowed duration (in milliseconds) of any statement. 0 turns this off.
Enable synchronized sequential scans.
Sets the current transaction's synchronization level.
Treats "expr=NULL" as "expr IS NULL".
Sets how binary values are to be encoded in XML.
Sets whether XML data in implicit parsing and serialization operations is to be considered as documents or content fragments.
Forces use of parallel query facilities.
Sets the maximum allowed duration of any idling transaction.
Sets the maximum number of parallel processes per executor node.
Sets the minimum size of relations to be considered for parallel scan.
Sets the planner's estimate of the cost of starting up worker processes for parallel query.
Sets the planner's estimate of the cost of passing each tuple (row) from worker to master backend.
Sets how many days a log file is saved for.

get.description: List all the configurations in a given server.

SslEnforcement.description: Enable ssl enforcement or not when connect to server.

TrackedResource.description: Resource properties including location and tags for track resources.

location.description: The location the resource resides in.

tags.description: Application-specific metadata in the form of key-value pairs.

administratorLogin.description: The administrator's login name of a server. Can only be specified when the server is being created (and is required for creation).

storageMB.description: The maximum storage allowed for a server.

sslEnforcement.description: Enable ssl enforcement or not when connect to server.

userVisibleState.description: A state of a server that is visible to user.

fullyQualifiedDomainName.description: The fully qualified domain name of a server.

storageMB.description: The maximum storage allowed for a server.

sslEnforcement.description: Enable ssl enforcement or not when connect to server.

createMode.description: The mode to create a new server.

ServerPropertiesForCreate.description: The properties used to create a new server.

administratorLogin.description: The administrator's login name of a server. Can only be specified when the server is being created (and is required for creation).

administratorLoginPassword.description: The password of the administrator login.

ServerPropertiesForDefaultCreate.description: The properties used to create a new server.

sourceServerId.description: The source server id to restore from.

restorePointInTime.description: Restore point creation time (ISO8601 format), specifying the time to restore from.

ServerPropertiesForRestore.description: The properties to a new server by restoring from a backup.

name.description: The name of the sku, typically, a letter + Number code, e.g. P3.

tier.description: The tier of the particular SKU, e.g. Basic.

capacity.description: The scale up/out capacity, representing server's compute units.

size.description: The size code, to be interpreted by resource as appropriate.

Sku.description: Billing information related properties of a server.

sku.description: The SKU (pricing tier) of the server.

properties.description: Properties of the server.

sku.description: The SKU (pricing tier) of the server.

properties.description: Properties of the server.

location.description: The location the resource resides in.

tags.description: Application-specific metadata in the form of key-value pairs.

ServerForCreate.description: Represents a server to be created.

sku.description: The SKU (pricing tier) of the server.

storageMB.description: The max storage allowed for a server.

administratorLoginPassword.description: The password of the administrator login.

sslEnforcement.description: Enable ssl enforcement or not when connect to server.

properties.description: The properties that can be updated for a server.

tags.description: Application-specific metadata in the form of key-value pairs.

ServerUpdateParameters.description: Parameters allowd to update for a server.

startIpAddress.description: The start IP address of the server firewall rule. Must be IPv4 format.

endIpAddress.description: The end IP address of the server firewall rule. Must be IPv4 format.

FirewallRuleProperties.description: The properties of a server firewall rule.

properties.description: The properties of a firewall rule.

value.description: The list of firewall rules in a server.

properties.description: The properties of a database.

value.description: The list of databases housed in a server

properties.description: The properties of a configuration.

resource.description: Resource on which the operation is performed.

operation.description: Localized friendly name for the operation.

OperationDisplay.description: Display metadata associated with the operation.

name.description: The name of the operation being performed on this particular object.

display.description: The localized display information for this particular operation or action.

origin.description: The intended executor of the operation.

properties.description: Additional descriptions for the operation.

value.description: The list of resource provider operations.

OperationListResult.description: A list of resource provider operations.

createdTime.description: Creation timestamp of the log file.

lastModifiedTime.description: Last modified timestamp of the log file.

url.description: The url to download the log file from.

LogFileProperties.description: The properties of a log file.

name.description: The name of the log file.

properties.description: The properties of the log file.

id.description: ID for the service level objective.

dtu.description: Database throughput unit associated with the service level objective

storageMB.description: Maximum storage in MB associated with the service level objective

PerformanceTierServiceLevelObjectives.description: Service level objectives for performance tier.

backupRetentionDays.description: Backup retention in days for the performance tier edition

serviceLevelObjectives.description: Service level objectives associated with the performance tier

NameAvailabilityRequest.description: Request from client to check resource name availability.

nameAvailable.description: Indicates whether the resource name is available.

SubscriptionIdParameter.name: subscriptionId
SubscriptionIdParameter.description: The subscription ID that identifies an Azure subscription.

ApiVersionParameter.name: api-version
ApiVersionParameter.description: The API version to use for the request.

ResourceGroupParameter.name: resourceGroupName
ResourceGroupParameter.description: The name of the resource group that contains the resource. You can obtain this value from the Azure Resource Manager API or the portal.

FirewallRuleNameParameter.name: firewallRuleName
FirewallRuleNameParameter.description: The name of the server firewall rule.

ConfigurationNameParameter.name: configurationName
ConfigurationNameParameter.description: The name of the server configuration.
